title: 1941년 Shutrump 사건
summary: 미국 Ohio, OH 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Shutrump. 판결일: 1941-10-22. 법원: Ohio Supreme Court.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The State, Ex Rel. Julius Et Al., v. Shutrump Et Al., Board of Elections of Mahoning County
**판결일**: 1941-10-22
**법원**: Ohio Supreme Court
**관할**: Ohio, OH

**판사**: Bettman, Hart, Matthias, Turner, Weygandt, Williams, Zimmerman

## 변호인

Mr. Carrington T. Marshall, Mr. Joseph E. Julius  and  Mr.  Anthony F. Pacella , for relators.

 Mr. William, A. Ambrose , prosecuting attorney, and  Mr. Harold  H. Hull , for respondents.

## 인용

- 37 N.E.2d 55
- 138 Ohio St. 524
- 138 Ohio St. (N.S.) 524

## 판결문 요약

A permanent injunction having been issued and remaining in effect against the board of elections on the ground of fraud, there is no clear legal duty resting upon the board which this court will command to be performed. Section 12283, General Code; 25 Ohio Jurisprudence, 997 and 1026, Sections 23 and 44;Ohio  Indiana Rd. Co. v. Commrs. of Wyandot County, 7 Ohio St. 278.
Writ denied.
WEYGANDT, C.J., TURNER, WILLIAMS, HART, ZIMMERMAN and BETTMAN, JJ., concur.
MATTHIAS, J., not participating....
